Post_Title: r/Conspiracy links to Daily Stormer article claiming Reddit is "curated by an army of Jews"

Threads.Reply_Text: I truly think everything on that site is sarcasm and parody. I once read an article on how all truckers are gay cause they eat soy. I believe Andrew Anglin writes way out there articles and fools just agree with it

Replies.Reply_Text:
> I truly think everything on that site is sarcasm and parody.


Years of literal nazi propaganda disagrees with your personal assessment.

They use [tongue-in-cheek humour](https://www.huffpost.com/entry/daily-stormer-nazi-style-guide_n_5a2ece19e4b0ce3b344492f2) to sugar-coat their virulent racism to "make it go down easier", and prevent people from spitting it out.
